required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Response to Albuterol Delivered Through an Anti-static Valved Holding Chamber During Nocturnal Bronchospasm
clinical_study.official_title: Response to Albuterol Delivered Through an Anti-static Valved Holding Chamber During Nocturnal Bronchospasm

brief_summary.textblock: Delivery of HFA albuterol through an antistatic valved holding chamber (VHC) will improve bronchodilator response during nocturnal bronchospasm.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Y=100([FEV1 at 1 Puffs-FEV1 at 4AM)/FEV1@4AM] Difference Period 2 Minus Period 1.
primary_outcome.time_frame: fifteen minutes after 1 puff of albuterol
primary_outcome.description: (Percent improvement in FEV1 Post Dose for Period 2 over 4AM Baseline value) less (Percent improvement in FEV1 Post Dose for Period 1 over 4AM Baseline value) when 1 Puff go into chamber

primary_outcome.measure: Y=100([FEV1 at 2 Puffs-FEV1 at 4AM)/FEV1@4AM] Difference Period 2 Minus Period 1.
primary_outcome.description: (Percent improvement in FEV1 Post Dose for Period 2 over 4AM Baseline value) less (Percent improvement in FEV1 Post Dose for Period 1 over 4AM Baseline value) when 2 Puffs go into chamber

primary_outcome.measure: Y=100([FEV1 at 4 Puffs-FEV1 at 4AM)/FEV1@4AM] Difference Period 2 Minus Period 1.
primary_outcome.time_frame: fifteen minutes after 4 puffs of albuterol
primary_outcome.description: (Percent improvement in FEV1 Post Dose for Period 2 over 4AM Baseline value)less (Percent improvement in FEV1 Post Dose for Period 1 over 4AM Baseline value) when 4 Puffs go into chamber

arm_group.description: albuterol anti-static first then static chamber second.

intervention.description: albuterol with Static then anti-static chambers

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 18-65 years.
- Physician diagnosis of asthma.
- FEV1 60-80% predicted during the day.
- FEV1 increases ≥ 12 % and to ≥ 80% predicted after 2- 4 puffs of albuterol HFA MDI delivered by antistatic VHC.
- No smoking in the previous year and < 10-pack year history.
- No history of severe asthma attacks requiring ER visit or hospitalization in the previous three months.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient required a short course of oral steroid in the past 30 days.
- Any disease that is inadequately controlled or any medication that would worsen asthma or interact with asthma medications.
- History of viral respiratory tract infection in the 3 weeks prior to the screening visit.
- Positive pregnancy test.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Recruitment process was done in the Asthma Research Lab. Note that 88 were screened and 4 subjects randomized but determined to be ineligile before starting treatment. They are amongst the screen failures.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Subjects qualified in the screening visit went into a 7 day run-in-period They needed to have a 20% peak flow overnight drop on 3/7 nights in order to qualify for overnight stays in the Clinical Research Center. Arms are identified by order of treatment assignment. Any other designation is not consistent with our protocol requirements.

group.title: Anti-static/Static
group.description: albuterol with anti-static chamber then Static on another night

group.title: Static/Antistatic
group.description: albuterol with static chamber then with antistatic chamber on another night.

group.title: Anti-static/Static
group.description: albuterol with anti-static chamber then Static on another night

group.title: Static/Antistatic
group.description: albuterol with static chamber then with antistatic chamber on another night.

outcome.title: Y=100([FEV1 at 1 Puffs-FEV1 at 4AM)/FEV1@4AM] Difference Period 2 Minus Period 1.
outcome.description: (Percent improvement in FEV1 Post Dose for Period 2 over 4AM Baseline value) less (Percent improvement in FEV1 Post Dose for Period 1 over 4AM Baseline value) when 1 Puff go into chamber
outcome.time_frame: fifteen minutes after 1 puff of albuterol
outcome.population: Study intended to get more subjects, but PI's review committee had to deal with candidate deadlines and a high rate of screen failures and allowed her to test seven subjects. Primary concern was the research experience, not the study questions. There was no bias in failing to meet accrual objectives thanks to the blinding.

Primary concern was the research experience, not the study questions. There was no bias in failing to meet accrual objectives thanks to the blinding.

analysis.groups_desc: (Comparison of period 2 minus period 1) results Point and interval estimates are halved because this estimates twice the effect size.
analysis.method_desc: two sample effect size must be halved to account for mean difference estimates twice the effect size

analysis.groups_desc: Study intended to get more subjects, but PI's review committee had to deal with candidate deadlines and a high rate of screen failures and allowed her to test seven subjects. Primary concern was the research experience, not the study questions. There was no bias in failing to meet accrual objectives thanks to the blinding.
analysis.p_value_desc: The effect size is half the difference between the means as (A-B)-(B-A)=2A-2B
analysis.method_desc: Must take half the mean difference to estimate effect size

analysis.groups_desc: Null hypothesis is that the Treatment order is independent of the dependent variable based on Period 2 minus Period 1
analysis.estimate_desc: You kicked this out on another trial, but note that the period 2-Period 1 differences between the orderings estimate twice the effect size. The effect sizes herein take this into account.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: Nocturnal asthma model is a very sensitive model, but very labor intensive and to get more completed subjects, we might need to do multicenter trial

point_of_contact.name_or_title: Dr.Sreekala Prabhakaran. Clinical Assistant Professor Pediatrics
